description.@en: None shall trespass across this magic powder; intruders will be revealed.

effect.@en:
Create Ostane’s Dust: Depending on where you’re at on the Damage Condition Track, the Difficulty Rating eases or worsens:

Unharmed: (Easy +20%) Alchemy

Hurt: (Routine +10%) Alchemy

Moderately Wounded: (Standard +/-0%) Alchemy

Seriously Wounded: (Challenging -10%) Alchemy

Grievously Wounded: (Hard -20%) Alchemy

Effect: If successful, you create a number of vials for every 6 points of your [IB]. If failed, nothing happens.

[IB] 1 to 6: One vial

[IB] 7 to 12: Two vials

[IB] 13+: Three vials

criticalSuccess.@en: You create Three vials of Ostane’s Dust.

reagents.@en: You must have access to an alchemical laboratory, salt and talc. One vial of Ostane’s Dust can be poured into a Burst Template. Any who trespass across the dust are immediately revealed, even if hiding, Insubstantial or invisible.
